data.name: 502 Bad Gateway Token
data.description:
Created to protect all those who are investing in crypto currency. If there are any circumstances such as exchange being down, Z502 tokens will be distributed in order to compensate for their losses. It is a token created for investors by the investors.

We also built a partnership with MBK Co., Ltd. and is an investment company built 72 years ago, and 70 years of being listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange 2nd Section. MBK mainly invested in real estates, but recently did an acquisition of an exchange in Estonia called ANGOO FinTech. [Z502 is now an official exchange token in this exchange](https://medium.com/@ANGOO_FinTech/502-bad-gateway-token-z502-has-begun-to-be-used-as-an-exchange-token-on-angoo-fintech-d4d502578dd7).

Token Usage

1) Allows users to pay fees for trading, transactions, and will receive a large discount.
2) As soon as D502-DeFi is launched, users will be able to earn D502 by staking Z502.
3) In D502-DeFi, you can choose which token to pay the transaction fee. Not only you can pay the fees with ERC 20 tokens such as ETH and USDT, but will be able to pay with tokens that are distributed from different platforms such as ADA.

Z502 DeFi system called D502 Swap Time Machine was launched on Nov. 30, 2020. More pairs are currently in plan to be added. Following are the pairs user can currently swap:

・Z502-ETH

・D502-ETH

・USDT-ETH

・USDC-ETH

・USDT-USDC 
 
Once the user adds liquidity to the pair selected, DLP token will be provided to the user and by staking DLP token, users will earn D502.

[D502 Swap Time Machine
](https://d502.io/)
